api-servers.description: OpenAPI `servers` must be present and non-empty array.

model-description.description: Model `description` must be present and non-empty string.

operation-security-defined.description: Operation `security` values must match a scheme defined in the `components.securitySchemes` object.

server-not-example.com.description: Server URL should not point at `example.com`.

server-trailing-slash.description: Server URL should not have a trailing slash.

valid-example.description: Examples must be valid against their defined schema.
